> <OLD - Nightlight>
>
> Nighlight nodded but the story about the insective creatures was something
> that she had never heard abaout; she said in low voice, just loud enough to
> allow Dark Rodimus listen "Eventually you will remember... I cant fill up
> the gaps, not here, it would be dangerous for us..."
>
> then Nigthlight looked around and the oppresive sorroundings give her creeps

<NEW>

Oppressive is right. Even in RODIMUS' chamber it is still somewhat
dim. The lights brightened at his entrance, but the interior was still
somehwat spartan and the walls were colored in a dark colored paint. A
desk and chair, a recharging chamber, a samll viewscreen and a control
panel presumably hooked to the bases computer systems. There was a
small work out center on one side where RODIMUS could presumably work
on his target practice as well as work on testing the upper limits of
strength and endurance.

In one corner there was a picture of ELITA and NIGHTLIGHT it looked to
be hand drawn, although in the picture it was like NIGHTLIGHT was
before she got her current fuzor beastmode, something like how she was
when she first escaped HYDRAS' clutches.

That may also remind NIGHTLIGHT of what she may have heard of the
insectile creatures that RODIMUS mentioned. About how TUSCON and the
others had to fight their way past them and escape out of the other
side running back towards the ARK. RODIMUS had nearly sacrificed his
life at that point so that TUSCON could escape HYDRAS' base and TUSCON
had dragged him all the way back to be repaired. It was a thrilling
time. It was around the time that RODIMUS seemed to have fought off
the last of the dark taint that had been so much a part of his spark
and finally freed himself of being DARK RODIMUS!

And yet here was DARK RODIMUS again - - - strange isn't it?

DARK RODIMUS turned to look at NIGHTLIGHT, "So, when did you get the
new form?" He looked at her, examining her new frame and the changes
it made in her robot mode. "It is very . . . becoming on you."

(TAG)

Preston
